inclusion.criterion: Female who is at least 18 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Self-reports having at least two (2) daily hot flashes associated with menopause
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Taking hormonal therapy (currently or within the last 3 months)
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Has another existing medical condition that would prevent study compliance
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a healthy woman with no underlying disease, taking daily multivitamins and anti-hypertensive drugs.
